responses.text: Ramadan is the month of fasting in the Islamic calendar.

To perform prayer, you should follow these steps:
1. Make intention (niyyah)
2. Perform ablution (wudu)
3. Face the direction of the Kaaba (Qiblah)
4. Stand (if able)
5. Recite the opening takbir (Allahu Akbar)
6. Recite Surah Al-Fatihah
7. Recite another surah or verses from the Quran
8. Perform Ruku (bowing)
9. Perform Sujud (prostration)
10. Sit between two prostrations
11. Repeat steps 8 to 10 two more times
12. Perform Tashahhud (sitting for testimonial)
13. Recite Salah (final tashahhud)
14. End with salam (turning head to the right and then left).
